name: Compass Steel 3D
description: FEATURES:  Ad-free digital compass  Choose from multiple color themes  Choose between 2 heading modes - True heading (based on True north) and Magnetic heading (based on Magnetic north).   Sun direction indicator  Moon direction indicator  Sunrise and sunset times  Moonrise and moonset times  Self-calibrates as you use  Marine-style compass  PERMISSIONS:  Requires access to location coordinates to calculate True heading.
